1.name: Warborne
1.details: Each time Huo Shi takes or deals damage to an enemy Hero, he gains increased life steal for a few seconds (maximum 10 stacks).

2.name: Decimate
2.details:
Huo Shi gains increased movement speed for a few seconds and his next basic attack deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the target.

At maximum stack of Warborne, Decimate deals additional physical damage based on the target’s maximum health.

3.name: War Cry
3.details:
Huo Shi rallies, increasing his and nearby allies’ physical power over a duration.

At maximum stacks of Warborne, War Cry also increases Huo Shi's armour penetration.

4.name: Scorching Edge
4.details:
Huo Shi swings up his glaive to send out a flaming wave in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and slowing them for a short duration.

At maximum stacks of Warborne, Scorching Edge’s range and slow effect increase.

5.name: Challenger Ring
5.details:
Huo Shi picks a target enemy Hero, then slams down his glaive and creates an arena around him.

Inside the arena, he instantly gains maximum stacks of Warborne.

Enemy Heroes cannot walk out or into the arena.
